constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: SB1  South of the Borough
BSWN Name: Borough Strategic Walking Network
NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
SAC SAC Type: SPECIAL CONTROL OF ADVERTS
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

decision_conditions: An EIA is not required for the proposed development. Whilst it is acknowledged that the proposal would fall within table schedule 2 Column 1 3(a) Industrial installations for the production of electricity, steam and hot water (unless included in Schedule 1) of The Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 and would have a site area of more than 0.5 of a hectare. It would not fall within Schedule 1. The proposal would not trigger any significant effects outlined by schedule 3 of the regs and as such the proposal is not likely to have significant effects on the environment.Notwithstanding the above, given the Biodiversity interests of the site any future proposal must be supported by robust and detailed information with particular regards to protected species bats and great crested newts of which activity of these species has been recorded in the vicinity of the site and adjacent and nearby Sites of Importance for Nature Conservation (SNIC).
description: Request for screening opinion under regulation 6 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 (as amended) relating to proposed installation of a battery storage system with associated development at the Land North of Rushett Lane, Chessington.
